description: A peaceful tropical seaside village in the Conomi Islands featuring palm trees, mikan groves, and rice fields. The village is Nami's birthplace and has lived under the oppressive rule of the Arlong Pirates for eight years, forced to pay monthly tributes for survival.

keyEvents.title: Cocoyasi Village Debut
keyEvents.description: Cocoyasi Village is introduced as Nami's home village, living under Arlong's oppressive tribute system.
keyEvents.significance: Introduction of Nami's home and the central location for the emotional core of the Arlong Park Arc.

keyEvents.title: Arlong Confronts Genzo
keyEvents.description: Arlong arrives at the village to punish Genzo for possessing a weapon, demonstrating his tyrannical control.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the daily terror villagers face under Arlong's rule.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Saves Genzo
keyEvents.description: Usopp intervenes to stop Arlong from executing Genzo, preventing tragedy.
keyEvents.significance: First direct confrontation between a Straw Hat and Arlong in the village.

keyEvents.title: Arlong Nearly Destroys the Village
keyEvents.description: In rage at Usopp's intervention, Arlong lifts and throws a house, nearly destroying the village before his crew restrains him.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates how close the village constantly is to total annihilation.

statusHistory.reason: Under Arlong's oppressive rule, forced to pay monthly tributes

description: A peaceful clifftop grave overlooking the ocean where Bell-mère, Nami and Nojiko's adoptive mother, is buried. The location serves as a place of reflection and remembrance for Nami, where she renews her determination to free the village.

keyEvents.title: Bell-mère's Grave Introduced
keyEvents.description: Nami visits Bell-mère's grave on a cliff overlooking the ocean, a peaceful memorial to her adoptive mother.
keyEvents.significance: Introduction of a symbolic location representing Nami's motivation and connection to her past.

keyEvents.title: Nami's Determination Renewed
keyEvents.description: At Bell-mère's grave, Nami reaffirms her commitment to raising 100 million bellies to buy back Cocoyasi Village.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the emotional weight of Nami's quest and her connection to her mother's memory.

description: The ocean surrounding the Conomi Islands where Luffy, Sanji, and Yosaku encounter Momoo while traveling toward Arlong Park.

keyEvents.title: Momoo Encounter
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Sanji encounter and defeat Momoo in the ocean, then force the sea beast to carry them.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the crew's progress toward Arlong Park and their growing strength.

description: The fortress headquarters of the Arlong Pirates, featuring a large pool where fish-men can fight at full strength. This is where Zoro is imprisoned after being captured.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Tests Nami
keyEvents.description: Zoro jumps into the pool at Arlong Park to test Nami's loyalty, and she saves him.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals Nami's true feelings despite her facade of loyalty to Arlong.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Imprisoned
keyEvents.description: Zoro is imprisoned at Arlong Park following Nami's orders.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the rescue subplot for future episodes.
